text: Smetanova Lhota is a village of the PÃ­sek District in the South Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. In 2021, 263 people live there and covers an area of . Smetanova Lhota was first documented in 1384. Football player Jan Koller was born here. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Villages in the Czech Republic Category:South Bohemian Region
